SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class SqliteStudentDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.SqliteStudentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentDAO
public class SqliteStudentDAO extends Object implements StudentDAO
SQLite implementation of the StudentDAO interface for interacting with the 'students' table. Provides CRUD operations and query methods for retrieving student records by class, subject, email, or ID.
